entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow or periods of rain mixed with drizzle early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
